page.title: 19 A CRANK 14YR OLD'S DAY
page.content: I live in a medium-sized detached house in Crank with my parents and my elder sister.My dad works shifts and my mother is a housewife,so,except when I am at school,life doesn't work on a nine to five basis. In the morning I get up at seven,and have breakfast with my mum and dad.At 8:25am I go out to the bus stop and get to school at about 8:45am. At dinnertime I usually go to my friend's house.School finishes at 4:00 and after getting on the bus at 4.20,I get home at 4:30. In the evening I don't usually go out because of transport problems,but at the weekend I go to Rainford or St.Hel- ens.I don't have time out with my family much,except in the school holidays,but do a lot of cycling. (MELANIE FOSTER)
